verses.verse: God,<WH430> you are my God.<WH430> I will earnestly seek<WH7836> you.<WH5315> My soul thirsts<WH6770> for you.<WH1320> My flesh longs<WH3642> for you,<WH6723> in a dry and weary<WH5889> land,<WH776> where there is no<WH1097> water.<WH4325>
So I have seen<WH2372> you in the sanctuary,<WH3519> watching<WH7200> your power<WH5797> and your glory.<WH3519>
Because your loving kindness<WH2617> is better<WH2896> than life,<WH2416> my lips<WH8193> shall praise you.<WH7623>
So I will bless<WH1288> you while I live.<WH2416> I will lift up<WH5375> my hands<WH3709> in your name.<WH8034>
My soul<WH5315> shall be satisfied<WH7646> as with the richest<WH1880> food.<WH2459> My mouth<WH6310> shall praise<WH1984> you with joyful<WH7445> lips,<WH8193>
when I remember<WH2142> you on my bed,<WH3326> and think<WH1897> about you in the night watches.<WH821>
For you have been my help.<WH5833> I will rejoice<WH7442> in the shadow<WH6738> of your wings.<WH3671>
My soul<WH5315> stays close<WH1692> to<WH310> you.<WH3225> Your right hand holds me up.<WH8551>
But those who seek<WH1245> my soul,<WH5315> to destroy<WH7722> it,<WH935> shall go into the lower parts<WH8482> of the earth.<WH776>
They shall be given over<WH5064> to the power of the sword.<WH3027> They shall be jackal<WH7776> food.<WH4521>

But the king<WH4428> shall rejoice<WH8055> in God.<WH430> Everyone who swears<WH7650> by him will praise<WH1984> him,<WH6310> for the mouth of those who speak<WH1696> lies<WH8267> shall be silenced.<WH5534>
